contents: Article 9-2 (Meeting Operation) ① For the smooth operation of the meeting, the chairperson may designate a referee for the cases decided by the chairperson and have them supervise the handling of the case. ② The Committee may establish a conciliation and arbitration subcommittee and other subcommittees. 1. The number of subcommittee members shall be no more than 5, including the subcommittee chairperson. 2. The subcommittee performs the committee's preliminary deliberation function. ③ Meeting minutes must be prepared recording the date and time, place, attendees, agenda, discussion contents, and resolution results of the meeting, and the chairperson who conducted the meeting and one member recommended by the committee among the attending members must sign and seal the meeting. Newly established 2019. 12. 20.
